newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean won ends lower on import settlements.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean won ends lower on import settlements.

text.p: The won drooped on Tuesday, pressured by import settlements, brokers said.
The dollar's late day firmness against the yen further underlined the won's slide.
The won ended at 828.40 after ranging from 827.30 to 829.20. It had opened at 827.80.
"The volume of import deals was steady throughout the day, and there is talk that there will be much more toward the weekend," said a SEOULBANK dealer.
Dealers said Tuesday's importer deals were about $200 million. About $150-$200 million were seen on Wednesday.
